title: "AI Education for Teens: Lifting the Hood on Data and Machine Learning"
excerpt: "What are key ideas and intuitions foundational to AI that AI education in secondary schools should target? This blog post describes our approach to teaching AI and Machine Learning (AI/ML) to 13-15 year olds through situations/issues set in the context of cybersecurity in ways that \"lift the hood\" on how ML models are designed,"
